model-value.desc: Model of the component defining if it is shown or hidden to the user; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

reveal.description: Enable 'reveal' mode; Takes into account user scroll to temporarily show/hide footer

elevated.description: Adds a default shadow to the footer

height-hint.description: When using SSR, you can optionally hint of the height (in pixels) of the QFooter
